DOC.brief_summary: CS-8635 combine three widely prescribe antihypertensive medication , olmesartan medoxomil ( OM ) , amlodipine ( AML ) , hydrochlorothiazide ( HCTZ ) , low blood pressure . The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety triple therapy CS-8635 compare dual therapy Korean patient hypertension control dual fix dose combination therapy ( Olmetec® Plus ) . The treatment use study follow : Run-in period -OM/HCTZ 20/12.5 mg ( Olmetec® Plus 20/12.5 mg ) ; Double blind treatment period - OM/AML/HCTZ 20/5/12.5mg ( CS8635 20/5/12.5mg ) + match placebo vs.OM/HCTZ 20/12.5mg ( Olmetec® Plus 20/12.5 mg ) + match placebo ; Open label extension period - OM/AML/HCTZ 40/5/12.5mg ( CS8635 40/5/12.5mg ) OM/AML/HCTZ 20/5/12.5mg ( CS8635 20/5/12.5mg ) .
